title: How to write 3 or 4 dissertations about my book “World Next Year” - Quora

response.answer_text: You don't. A dissertation is a stand alone event.  Usually a research driven project that you are writing / reporting on.  Most dissertations are huge.  100-400 pages seems about right.  They also usually contain pages of references or sources. You don't write a dissertation about one book. You can however promote, one book.  Blog posts, press releases, news articles, journal articles, personal writings.  Whatever.  The question is how to promote and how to publish.
